description:
I want to click on Women Menu
    I want to test various sorting options
name: Test Sort Funtionality on website.

elements.name: User sorts by "Price: Lowest first" and validate results

steps.name: User clicks on "Women" and should see all "Women" clothes
User clicks on product Sorting drop down and select "Price: Lowest first"
User checks products are sorted by lowest price first

elements.name: User sorts by "Price: Highest first" and validate results

steps.name: User clicks on "Women" and should see all "Women" clothes
User clicks on product Sorting drop down and select "Price: Highest first"
User checks products are sorted by highest price first

result.error_message:
AssertionError: expected [ Array(7) ] to be sorted in descending order
    at Proxy.chaiIsSorted (http://automationpractice.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/support/index.js:76:8)
    at Proxy.eval (http://automationpractice.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/support/index.js:85:18)
    at Context.eval (http://automationpractice.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/TC002_sorting.feature:89:33)

elements.name: User sorts by "Product Name: A to Z" and validate results

steps.name: User clicks on "Women" and should see all "Women" clothes
User clicks on product Sorting drop down and select "Product Name: A to Z"
User checks products are sorted by name A to Z

elements.name: User sorts by "Product Name: Z to A" and validate results

steps.name: User clicks on "Women" and should see all "Women" clothes
User clicks on product Sorting drop down and select "Product Name: Z to A"
User checks products are sorted by name Z to A

result.error_message:
AssertionError
    + expected - actual

    -[ 'Blouse',
    -  'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts',
    -  'Printed Chiffon Dress',
    +[ 'Printed Summer Dress',
    +  'Printed Summer Dress',
       'Printed Dress',
       'Printed Dress',
    -  'Printed Summer Dress',
    -  'Printed Summer Dress' ]
    +  'Printed Chiffon Dress',
    +  'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts',
    +  'Blouse' ]

    at Context.eval (http://automationpractice.com/__cypress/tests?p=cypress/integration/TC002_sorting.feature:116:26)

elements.name: User sorts by "In stock" and validate results

steps.name: User clicks on "Dresses" and should see all "Dresses" clothes
User clicks on product Sorting drop down and select "In stock"
User checks only In stock product are displayed
